completion.autoRequire.markdownDescription: 输入内容看起来是个文件名时，自动 `require` 此文件。

markdownEnumDescriptions: 显示 `函数名` 与 `调用片段`。

completion.displayContext.markdownDescription: 预览建议的相关代码片段，可能可以帮助你了解这项建议的用法。设置的数字表示代码片段的截取行数，设置为`0`可以禁用此功能。

markdownEnumDescriptions: 显示 `关键字` 与 `语法片段`。

completion.postfix.markdownDescription: 用于触发后缀建议的符号。

completion.showParams.markdownDescription: 在建议列表中显示函数的参数信息，函数拥有多个定义时会分开显示。

completion.showWord.markdownDescription: 在建议中显示上下文单词。
markdownEnumDescriptions: 总是在建议中显示上下文单词。
无法根据语义提供建议时才显示上下文单词。

completion.workspaceWord.markdownDescription: 显示的上下文单词是否包含工作区中其他文件的内容。

diagnostics.disable.markdownDescription: 禁用的诊断（使用浮框括号内的代码）。

diagnostics.disableScheme.markdownDescription: 不诊断使用以下 scheme 的lua文件。

diagnostics.groupFileStatus.markdownDescription:
批量修改一个组中的文件状态。

* Opened:  只诊断打开的文件
* Any:     诊断任何文件
* None:    禁用此诊断

设置为 `Fallback` 意味着组中的诊断由 `diagnostics.neededFileStatus` 单独设置。
其他设置将覆盖单独设置，但是不会覆盖以 `!` 结尾的设置。

luadoc.description:
* circle-doc-class
* doc-field-no-class
* duplicate-doc-alias
* duplicate-doc-field
* duplicate-doc-param
* undefined-doc-class
* undefined-doc-name
* undefined-doc-param
* unknown-cast-variable
* unknown-diag-code
* unknown-operator

type-check.description:
* assign-type-mismatch
* cast-local-type
* cast-type-mismatch
* need-check-nil
* param-type-mismatch
* return-type-mismatch
* undefined-field

unbalanced.description:
* missing-parameter
* missing-return
* missing-return-value
* redundant-parameter
* redundant-return-value
* redundant-value
* unbalanced-assignments

unused.description:
* code-after-break
* empty-block
* redundant-return
* trailing-space
* unreachable-code
* unused-function
* unused-label
* unused-local
* unused-vararg

diagnostics.groupFileStatus.title: groupFileStatus

diagnostics.groupSeverity.markdownDescription:
批量修改一个组中的诊断等级。
设置为 `Fallback` 意味着组中的诊断由 `diagnostics.severity` 单独设置。
其他设置将覆盖单独设置，但是不会覆盖以 `!` 结尾的设置。

luadoc.description:
* circle-doc-class
* doc-field-no-class
* duplicate-doc-alias
* duplicate-doc-field
* duplicate-doc-param
* undefined-doc-class
* undefined-doc-name
* undefined-doc-param
* unknown-cast-variable
* unknown-diag-code
* unknown-operator

type-check.description:
* assign-type-mismatch
* cast-local-type
* cast-type-mismatch
* need-check-nil
* param-type-mismatch
* return-type-mismatch
* undefined-field

unbalanced.description:
* missing-parameter
* missing-return
* missing-return-value
* redundant-parameter
* redundant-return-value
* redundant-value
* unbalanced-assignments

unused.description:
* code-after-break
* empty-block
* redundant-return
* trailing-space
* unreachable-code
* unused-function
* unused-label
* unused-local
* unused-vararg

diagnostics.groupSeverity.title: groupSeverity

diagnostics.ignoredFiles.markdownDescription: 如何诊断被忽略的文件。
markdownEnumDescriptions: 只有打开这些文件时才会诊断。

diagnostics.libraryFiles.markdownDescription: 如何诊断通过 `Lua.workspace.library` 加载的文件。
markdownEnumDescriptions: 只有打开这些文件时才会诊断。

diagnostics.neededFileStatus.markdownDescription:
* Opened:  只诊断打开的文件
* Any:     诊断任何文件
* None:    禁用此诊断

以 `!` 结尾的设置优先级高于组设置 `diagnostics.groupFileStatus`。

ambiguity-1.description: 优先级歧义，如：`num or 0 + 1`，推测用户的实际期望为 `(num or 0) + 1`

assign-type-mismatch.description: Enable diagnostics for assignments in which the value's type does not match the type of the assigned variable.

await-in-sync.description: Enable diagnostics for calls of asynchronous functions within a synchronous function.

cast-local-type.description: Enable diagnostics for casts of local variables where the target type does not match the defined type.

cast-type-mismatch.description: Enable diagnostics for casts where the target type does not match the initial type.

close-non-object.description: Enable diagnostics for attempts to close a variable with a non-object.

code-after-break.description: Enable diagnostics for code placed after a break statement in a loop.

codestyle-check.description: Enable diagnostics for incorrectly styled lines.

count-down-loop.description: Enable diagnostics for `for` loops which will never reach their max/limit because the loop is incrementing instead of decrementing.

deprecated.description: Enable diagnostics to highlight deprecated API.

different-requires.description: Enable diagnostics for files which are required by two different paths.

discard-returns.description: Enable diagnostics for calls of functions annotated with `---@nodiscard` where the return values are ignored.

doc-field-no-class.description: Enable diagnostics to highlight a field annotation without a defining class annotation.

duplicate-doc-alias.description: Enable diagnostics for a duplicated alias annotation name.

duplicate-doc-field.description: Enable diagnostics for a duplicated field annotation name.

duplicate-doc-param.description: Enable diagnostics for a duplicated param annotation name.

duplicate-index.description: 在字面量表中重复定义了索引

duplicate-set-field.description: Enable diagnostics for setting the same field in a class more than once.

global-in-nil-env.description: 不能使用全局变量（ `_ENV` 被设置为了 `nil`）

lowercase-global.description: 首字母小写的全局变量定义

missing-parameter.description: Enable diagnostics for function calls where the number of arguments is less than the number of annotated function parameters.

missing-return.description: Enable diagnostics for functions with return annotations which have no return statement.

missing-return-value.description: Enable diagnostics for return statements without values although the containing function declares returns.

need-check-nil.description: Enable diagnostics for variable usages if `nil` or an optional (potentially `nil`) value was assigned to the variable before.

newfield-call.description: 在字面量表中，2行代码之间缺少分隔符，在语法上被解析为了一次索引操作

newline-call.description: 以 `(` 开始的新行，在语法上被解析为了上一行的函数调用

no-unknown.description: Enable diagnostics for cases in which the type cannot be inferred.

not-yieldable.description: Enable diagnostics for calls to `coroutine.yield()` when it is not permitted.

param-type-mismatch.description: Enable diagnostics for function calls where the type of a provided parameter does not match the type of the annotated function definition.

redundant-parameter.description: 函数调用时，传入了多余的参数

redundant-return.description: Enable diagnostics for return statements which are not needed because the function would exit on its own.

redundant-return-value.description: Enable diagnostics for return statements which return an extra value which is not specified by a return annotation.

redundant-value.description: 赋值操作时，值的数量比被赋值的对象多

return-type-mismatch.description: Enable diagnostics for return values whose type does not match the type declared in the corresponding return annotation.

spell-check.description: Enable diagnostics for typos in strings.

unbalanced-assignments.description: Enable diagnostics on multiple assignments if not all variables obtain a value (e.g., `local x,y = 1`).

undefined-doc-class.description: Enable diagnostics for class annotations in which an undefined class is referenced.

undefined-doc-name.description: Enable diagnostics for type annotations referencing an undefined type or alias.

undefined-doc-param.description: Enable diagnostics for cases in which a parameter annotation is given without declaring the parameter in the function definition.

undefined-env-child.description: `_ENV` 被设置为了新的字面量表，但是试图获取的全局变量不再这张表中

undefined-field.description: Enable diagnostics for cases in which an undefined field of a variable is read.

unknown-cast-variable.description: Enable diagnostics for casts of undefined variables.

unknown-diag-code.description: Enable diagnostics in cases in which an unknown diagnostics code is entered.

diagnostics.neededFileStatus.title: neededFileStatus

diagnostics.severity.markdownDescription:
修改诊断等级。
以 `!` 结尾的设置优先级高于组设置 `diagnostics.groupSeverity`。

ambiguity-1.description: 优先级歧义，如：`num or 0 + 1`，推测用户的实际期望为 `(num or 0) + 1`

assign-type-mismatch.description: Enable diagnostics for assignments in which the value's type does not match the type of the assigned variable.

await-in-sync.description: Enable diagnostics for calls of asynchronous functions within a synchronous function.

cast-local-type.description: Enable diagnostics for casts of local variables where the target type does not match the defined type.

cast-type-mismatch.description: Enable diagnostics for casts where the target type does not match the initial type.

close-non-object.description: Enable diagnostics for attempts to close a variable with a non-object.

code-after-break.description: Enable diagnostics for code placed after a break statement in a loop.

codestyle-check.description: Enable diagnostics for incorrectly styled lines.

count-down-loop.description: Enable diagnostics for `for` loops which will never reach their max/limit because the loop is incrementing instead of decrementing.

deprecated.description: Enable diagnostics to highlight deprecated API.

different-requires.description: Enable diagnostics for files which are required by two different paths.

discard-returns.description: Enable diagnostics for calls of functions annotated with `---@nodiscard` where the return values are ignored.

doc-field-no-class.description: Enable diagnostics to highlight a field annotation without a defining class annotation.

duplicate-doc-alias.description: Enable diagnostics for a duplicated alias annotation name.

duplicate-doc-field.description: Enable diagnostics for a duplicated field annotation name.

duplicate-doc-param.description: Enable diagnostics for a duplicated param annotation name.

duplicate-index.description: 在字面量表中重复定义了索引

duplicate-set-field.description: Enable diagnostics for setting the same field in a class more than once.

global-in-nil-env.description: 不能使用全局变量（ `_ENV` 被设置为了 `nil`）

lowercase-global.description: 首字母小写的全局变量定义

missing-parameter.description: Enable diagnostics for function calls where the number of arguments is less than the number of annotated function parameters.

missing-return.description: Enable diagnostics for functions with return annotations which have no return statement.

missing-return-value.description: Enable diagnostics for return statements without values although the containing function declares returns.

need-check-nil.description: Enable diagnostics for variable usages if `nil` or an optional (potentially `nil`) value was assigned to the variable before.

newfield-call.description: 在字面量表中，2行代码之间缺少分隔符，在语法上被解析为了一次索引操作

newline-call.description: 以 `(` 开始的新行，在语法上被解析为了上一行的函数调用

no-unknown.description: Enable diagnostics for cases in which the type cannot be inferred.

not-yieldable.description: Enable diagnostics for calls to `coroutine.yield()` when it is not permitted.

param-type-mismatch.description: Enable diagnostics for function calls where the type of a provided parameter does not match the type of the annotated function definition.

redundant-parameter.description: 函数调用时，传入了多余的参数

redundant-return.description: Enable diagnostics for return statements which are not needed because the function would exit on its own.

redundant-return-value.description: Enable diagnostics for return statements which return an extra value which is not specified by a return annotation.

redundant-value.description: 赋值操作时，值的数量比被赋值的对象多

return-type-mismatch.description: Enable diagnostics for return values whose type does not match the type declared in the corresponding return annotation.

spell-check.description: Enable diagnostics for typos in strings.

unbalanced-assignments.description: Enable diagnostics on multiple assignments if not all variables obtain a value (e.g., `local x,y = 1`).

undefined-doc-class.description: Enable diagnostics for class annotations in which an undefined class is referenced.

undefined-doc-name.description: Enable diagnostics for type annotations referencing an undefined type or alias.

undefined-doc-param.description: Enable diagnostics for cases in which a parameter annotation is given without declaring the parameter in the function definition.

undefined-env-child.description: `_ENV` 被设置为了新的字面量表，但是试图获取的全局变量不再这张表中

undefined-field.description: Enable diagnostics for cases in which an undefined field of a variable is read.

unknown-cast-variable.description: Enable diagnostics for casts of undefined variables.

unknown-diag-code.description: Enable diagnostics in cases in which an unknown diagnostics code is entered.

diagnostics.severity.title: severity

diagnostics.unusedLocalExclude.markdownDescription: 如果变量名匹配以下规则，则不对其进行 `unused-local` 诊断。

diagnostics.workspaceDelay.markdownDescription: 进行工作区诊断的延迟（毫秒）。

diagnostics.workspaceEvent.markdownDescription: 设置触发工作区诊断的时机。
markdownEnumDescriptions: 当文件发生变化时触发工作区诊断。
当文件保存时触发工作区诊断。

diagnostics.workspaceRate.markdownDescription: 工作区诊断的运行速率（百分比）。降低该值会减少CPU占用，但是也会降低工作区诊断的速度。你当前正在编辑的文件的诊断总是全速完成，不受该选项影响。

doc.packageName.markdownDescription: 将特定名称的字段视为package，例如 `m_*` 意味着 `XXX.m_id` 与 `XXX.m_type` 只能在定义所在的文件中访问。

doc.privateName.markdownDescription: 将特定名称的字段视为私有，例如 `m_*` 意味着 `XXX.m_id` 与 `XXX.m_type` 是私有字段，只能在定义所在的类中访问。

doc.protectedName.markdownDescription: 将特定名称的字段视为受保护，例如 `m_*` 意味着 `XXX.m_id` 与 `XXX.m_type` 是受保护的字段，只能在定义所在的类极其子类中访问。

format.defaultConfig.markdownDescription:
默认的格式化配置，优先级低于工作区内的 `.editorconfig` 文件。
请查阅[格式化文档](https://github.com/CppCXY/EmmyLuaCodeStyle/tree/master/docs)了解用法。
format.defaultConfig.title: defaultConfig

hint.arrayIndex.markdownDescription: 在构造表时提示数组索引。
markdownEnumDescriptions: 所有的表中都提示数组索引。
只有表大于3项，或者表是混合类型时才进行提示。

hint.await.markdownDescription: 如果调用的函数被标记为了 `---@async` ，则在调用处提示 `await` 。

hint.paramName.markdownDescription: 在函数调用处提示参数名。
markdownEnumDescriptions: 所有类型的参数均进行提示。
只有字面量类型的参数进行提示。

hint.paramType.markdownDescription: 在函数的参数位置提示类型。

hint.semicolon.markdownDescription: 若语句尾部没有分号，则显示虚拟分号。
markdownEnumDescriptions: 所有语句都显示虚拟分号。
2个语句在同一行时，在它们之间显示分号。

hint.setType.markdownDescription: 在赋值操作位置提示类型。

hover.enumsLimit.markdownDescription: 当值对应多个类型时，限制类型的显示数量。

hover.expandAlias.markdownDescription: 是否展开别名。例如 `---@alias myType boolean|number` 展开后显示为 `boolean|number`，否则显示为 `myType`。

hover.previewFields.markdownDescription: 悬停提示查看表时，限制表内字段的最大预览数量。

hover.viewNumber.markdownDescription: 悬停提示查看数字内容（仅当字面量不是十进制时）。

hover.viewString.markdownDescription: 悬停提示查看字符串内容（仅当字面量包含转义符时）。

hover.viewStringMax.markdownDescription: 悬停提示查看字符串内容时的最大长度。

misc.executablePath.markdownDescription: VSCode中指定可执行文件路径。

misc.parameters.markdownDescription: VSCode中启动语言服务时的[命令行参数](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Getting-Started#arguments)。

runtime.builtin.markdownDescription:
调整内置库的启用状态，你可以根据实际运行环境禁用掉不存在的库（或重新定义）。

* `default`: 表示库会根据运行版本启用或禁用
* `enable`: 总是启用
* `disable`: 总是禁用
runtime.builtin.title: builtin

runtime.fileEncoding.markdownDescription: 文件编码，`ansi` 选项只在 `Windows` 平台下有效。

runtime.nonstandardSymbol.markdownDescription: 支持非标准的符号。请务必确认你的运行环境支持这些符号。

runtime.path.markdownDescription:
当使用 `require` 时，如何根据输入的名字来查找文件。
此选项设置为 `?/init.lua` 意味着当你输入 `require 'myfile'` 时，会从已加载的文件中搜索 `{workspace}/myfile/init.lua`。
当 `runtime.pathStrict` 设置为 `false` 时，还会尝试搜索 `${workspace}/**/myfile/init.lua`。
如果你想要加载工作区以外的文件，你需要先设置 `Lua.workspace.library`。

runtime.pathStrict.markdownDescription: 启用后 `runtime.path` 将只搜索第一层目录，见 `runtime.path` 的说明。

runtime.plugin.markdownDescription: 插件路径，请查阅[文档](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Plugins)了解用法。

runtime.special.markdownDescription:
将自定义全局变量视为一些特殊的内置变量，语言服务将提供特殊的支持。
下面这个例子表示将 `include` 视为 `require` 。
```json
"Lua.runtime.special" : {
    "include" : "require"
}
```
runtime.special.title: special

runtime.unicodeName.markdownDescription: 允许在名字中使用 Unicode 字符。

semantic.annotation.markdownDescription: 对类型注解进行语义着色。

semantic.enable.markdownDescription: 启用语义着色。你可能需要同时将 `editor.semanticHighlighting.enabled` 设置为 `true` 才能生效。

semantic.keyword.markdownDescription: 对关键字/字面量/运算符进行语义着色。只有当你的编辑器无法进行语法着色时才需要启用此功能。

semantic.variable.markdownDescription: 对变量/字段/参数进行语义着色。

spell.dict.markdownDescription: 拼写检查的自定义单词。

telemetry.enable.markdownDescription: 启用遥测，通过网络发送你的编辑器信息与错误日志。在[此处](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/wiki/Home#privacy)阅读我们的隐私声明。

type.castNumberToInteger.markdownDescription: 允许将 `number` 类型赋给 `integer` 类型。

type.weakNilCheck.markdownDescription:
对联合类型进行类型检查时，忽略其中的 `nil`。

此设置为 `false` 时，`numer|nil` 类型无法赋给 `number` 类型；为 `true` 是则可以。

type.weakUnionCheck.markdownDescription:
联合类型中只要有一个子类型满足条件，则联合类型也满足条件。

此设置为 `false` 时，`number|boolean` 类型无法赋给 `number` 类型；为 `true` 时则可以。

window.statusBar.markdownDescription: 在状态栏显示插件状态。

workspace.checkThirdParty.markdownDescription:
自动检测与适配第三方库，目前支持的库为：

* OpenResty
* Cocos4.0
* LÖVE
* LÖVR
* skynet
* Jass

workspace.ignoreDir.markdownDescription: 忽略的文件与目录（使用 `.gitignore` 语法）。

workspace.library.markdownDescription: 除了当前工作区以外，还会从哪些目录中加载文件。这些目录中的文件将被视作外部提供的代码库，部分操作（如重命名字段）不会修改这些文件。

workspace.preloadFileSize.markdownDescription: 预加载时跳过大小大于该值（KB）的文件。

workspace.supportScheme.markdownDescription: 为以下 scheme 的lua文件提供语言服务。

workspace.useGitIgnore.markdownDescription: 忽略 `.gitignore` 中列举的文件。

workspace.userThirdParty.markdownDescription: 在这里添加私有的第三方库适配文件路径，请参考内置的[配置文件路径](https://github.com/sumneko/lua-language-server/tree/master/meta/3rd)
